entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
